Play:
The Dance of Sambaso
(Kotobuki shikisanbasō / 寿式三番叟)

Written By: Sakurada Jisuke, III (櫻田治助)

First Staged: 1766 (1878 under the present title)

Reference: Kokuritsu Gekijō jōen shiryōshū, edited by Kokuritsu Gekijō Geinō Chōsashitsu, vol. 177, May 1980; Bunraku May 1980 Performance Program

– Click image to view.

Performances:

January 1972: The Dance of Sambaso

January 1973: The Dance of Sambaso

January 1974: The Dance of Sambaso

January 1976: The Dance of Sambaso

May 1980: The Dance of Sambaso

January 1981: The Dance of Sambaso

April 1984: The Dance of Sambaso

May 1984: The Dance of Sambaso

January 1987: The Dance of Sambaso

January 1989: The Dance of Sambaso

October 1991: The Dance of Sambaso

January 1993: The Dance of Sambaso

April 1994: The Dance of Sambaso

January 1997: The Dance of Sambaso

Characters:

Senzai (Senzai / 千歳)

Okina (Okina / 翁)

Sambaso (Sanbasō / 三番叟)
